DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Monitoring Women Throughout Cesarean Sections
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single center study conduct Rabin Medical Center ( Beilinson Campus ) , Petach Tikva , Israel , tertiary university hospital . The Institutional Review Board approve study . Two hundred woman undergo cesarean section enrol fill informed consent form . Women recruit half hour preoperatively woman 's surgery waiting room n't experience pain , n't sedative . Following obtain informed consent maternal cardiac output monitor . The monitoring carry use non invasive NICaS cardiac impedance use two electrode sticker paste wrist 6 minute . Monitoring do woman lie sit half hour preoperatively ( woman 's surgery waiting room ) intraoperatively , postoperatively post anesthesia care unit ( PACU ) . Preoperative data compare intraoperative postoperative data , analyze order evaluate dynamic cardiac output change woman undergo cesarean section . Recorded data include : - Demographic obstetric - age , weight , height , current hemoglobin , co-morbidities , regular medication obstetric data . - Cardiovascular risk factor - family history cardiovascular disease , smoking , BMI - Obstetric history - obstetric background ( history gestational diabetes , preeclampsia , intrauterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) , stillbirths placental abruption ) . - Threshold pain accord VAS It emphasize conduct study interfere cesarean delivery protocol way .
